name: Block Buster
summary: Block Buster VR is an action-arcade game that’s all about creative demolition. It combines full-body destruction with cosplay, collecting, and crafting. Players will tear through cities, toss tanks, smash buildings, nibble people, and leave a wake of annihilation in their path in this homage to classic Kaiju monster films.
